result.arabic_text: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحٗا وَءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمۡرَٰنَ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: 33.Diggah Yalli Nabii Aadam kee Nabii Nuucuuy Nabii Ibraahim kee kay Buxah maraay (Nabii Ismaaqiliiy Nabii Iscaaqh kee Nabii Yaqqhuub kee ken xayloh Ambiya Nabii Mucammad edde Anuk) Qimraan Buxah marak (Nabii Qiisa keenil luk Anuk) Yalli ken dabaanih marak Nubuwwannuh ken dooriteeh ken muxxuseh.
